goal.core.mas

Class MultiLaunch

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.core.mas.MultiLaunch
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LaunchRule

    public class MultiLaunch
extends java.lang.Object
    A multilaunch instantiates one or several agents at the beginning of the execution. Those agents are not necessarily connected to an environment. Basically it is a List of Launch objects
    Author:
    W.Pasman 21mar2011
